mods.note: 257 Rev14WS72 Blue Cocanut Grove Flo 140P11. Hicks & Hicks Atty Dayton. I await decusion of tonights Conference pls keep all names Confidential until ans is received from Them include former Secretary Hughes among possibilities fundamentalists offer to Furnsh official stenographer without Cash to Report entire proceedings they want Complete records for publication later they will [finish?] extra Copies & [part?] to all news papers on equal terms if advise that we accept offer
